<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Arbiter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2791)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These spherical aeons are scouts and diplomats. Found throughout the multiverse, they have traditionally kept watch over chaos and its agents. With the announcement of the Convergence, many arbiters now serve as go-betweens among the aeon alliance and its mortal associates. 

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Arbiter.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Arbiter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2791)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Aeon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=525" />
<trait label="Monitor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=655" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 8 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), locate aeon

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115), [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Axis Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Locate Aeon** An arbiter can always sense the direction of the nearest non-arbiter aeon on the plane, but it can't sense the range to the aeon.

**Items**
[Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +7 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 22

</row>

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 17
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189) (×3), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **4th**
[Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)

**Electrical Burst** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56)) The arbiter releases an electrical burst from its body that deals 3d6 electricity damage to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation, with a DC 17 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. The arbiter is then [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93) for 24 hours.

</column>
